title: List of UEFA Europa Conference League finals
text:
The <a href="UEFA%20Europa%20Conference%20League">UEFA Europa Conference League</a> is a seasonal <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition established in 2021, which will run until at least the conclusion of the 2023/24 Season.
It was envisaged as a way for UEFA to accommodate at least 34 of their national associations in Group Stage Action, when combined with the <a href="UEFA%20Champions%20League">UEFA Champions League</a> and <a href="UEFA%20Europa%20League">UEFA Europa League</a>.
The Winner will qualify automatically for the subsequent Season's Europa League, unless they have already qualified for the Champions League through their Domestic League.
References.

Specific
